alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 15 at 5:44AM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Wisconsin... Mississippi River at McGregor affecting Crawford, Grant, Clayton and Allamakee Counties. Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10 affecting Grant and Clayton Counties. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mississippi River at McGregor. * WHEN...From Monday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Flooding of some residential areas begin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Monday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 545 PM CDT.
